mapper.select: SELECT HP_ID, HP_NAME, HP_ADDRESS, HP_NUMBER, HP_REGION FROM HOSPITAL
SELECT DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME FROM DEPT ORDER BY DEPT_NAME
SELECT DEPT_ID, DEPT_NAME FROM DEPT WHERE HP_ID = #{hpId} ORDER BY DEPT_NAME
SELECT * FROM HP_MEMBER WHERE DEPT_ID = #{deptId} ORDER BY DR_NAME

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, B.* FROM( SELECT R.REFER_ID , R.USER_NUM , (SELECT USER_NAME FROM USER_CLIENT WHERE USER_NUM=R.USER_NUM) AS USER_NAME , (SELECT H.HP_NAME FROM HOSPITAL H, DEPT D, HP_MEMBER M WHERE H.HP_ID = D.HP_ID AND D.DEPT_ID = M.DEPT_ID AND M.DR_ID = R.S_DR_ID) AS S_HP_NAME , (SELECT D.DEPT_NAME FROM HP_MEMBER H, DEPT D WHERE H.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID AND H.DR_ID = R.S_DR_ID) AS S_DEPT_NAME , R.S_DR_ID , (SELECT DR_NAME FROM HP_MEMBER WHERE DR_ID=R.S_DR_ID) AS S_DR_NAME , (SELECT H.HP_NAME FROM HOSPITAL H, DEPT D, HP_MEMBER M WHERE H.HP_ID = D.HP_ID AND D.DEPT_ID = M.DEPT_ID AND M.DR_ID = R.R_DR_ID) AS R_HP_NAME , (SELECT D.DEPT_NAME FROM HP_MEMBER H, DEPT D WHERE H.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID AND H.DR_ID = R.R_DR_ID) AS R_DEPT_NAME , R.R_DR_ID , (SELECT DR_NAME FROM HP_MEMBER WHERE DR_ID=R.R_DR_ID) AS R_DR_NAME , R.REFER_CONTENT , R.RESULT_CONTENT , DECODE(R.RECEIVE_CHK, '1', '확인 전', '2', '진행 중', '3', '완료', '4', '취소') AS RECEIVE_CHK , TO_CHAR(R.CREATED_AT,'YYYY-mm-DD') AS CREATE_DATE , TO_CHAR(R.UPDATED_AT,'YYYY-mm-DD') AS UPDATE_DATE , R.FILEONE , R.FILETWO , R.FILETHREE FROM REFERRAL R ORDER BY R.CREATED_AT DESC) B) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, B.* FROM( SELECT R.REFER_ID, R.USER_NUM, (SELECT USER_NAME FROM USER_CLIENT WHERE USER_NUM = R.USER_NUM) AS USER_NAME, (SELECT H.HP_NAME FROM HOSPITAL H, DEPT D, HP_MEMBER M WHERE H.HP_ID = D.HP_ID AND D.DEPT_ID = M.DEPT_ID AND M.DR_ID = R.S_DR_ID) AS S_HP_NAME, (SELECT D.DEPT_NAME FROM HP_MEMBER H, DEPT D WHERE H.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID AND H.DR_ID = R.S_DR_ID) AS S_DEPT_NAME, R.S_DR_ID, S_DR.DR_NAME AS S_DR_NAME, -- 조인된 S_DR_NAME (SELECT H.HP_NAME FROM HOSPITAL H, DEPT D, HP_MEMBER M WHERE H.HP_ID = D.HP_ID AND D.DEPT_ID = M.DEPT_ID AND M.DR_ID = R.R_DR_ID) AS R_HP_NAME, (SELECT D.DEPT_NAME FROM HP_MEMBER H, DEPT D WHERE H.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID AND H.DR_ID = R.R_DR_ID) AS R_DEPT_NAME, R.R_DR_ID, R_DR.DR_NAME AS R_DR_NAME, -- 조인된 R_DR_NAME R.REFER_CONTENT, R.RESULT_CONTENT, DECODE(R.RECEIVE_CHK, '1', '확인 전', '2', '진행 중', '3', '완료', '4', '취소') AS RECEIVE_CHK, TO_CHAR(R.CREATED_AT,'YYYY-mm-DD') AS CREATE_DATE, TO_CHAR(R.UPDATED_AT,'YYYY-mm-DD') AS UPDATE_DATE, R.FILEONE, R.FILETWO, R.FILETHREE FROM REFERRAL R LEFT JOIN HP_MEMBER S_DR ON R.S_DR_ID = S_DR.DR_ID -- S_DR_ID에 대한 HP_MEMBER 조인 LEFT JOIN HP_MEMBER R_DR ON R.R_DR_ID = R_DR.DR_ID -- R_DR_ID에 대한 HP_MEMBER 조인 WHERE R.R_DR_ID = #{drId} AND REFER_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' ORDER BY R.CREATED_AT DESC) B) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
